item.title: No Wireless LED on ThinkPad T61
item.author: troglobit@gmail.com (Joachim Nilsson)
item.description: I’ve got a ThinkPad T61 with Intel iwl3945 wireless chipset that I installed fresh with Ubuntu 8.04. Everything worked flawlessly out-of-the-box, except for the useless fingerprint scanner and the wireless LED. Don’t get me wrong, the wireless network worked fine, but the LED wasn’t on.
